newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 10 muni issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 10 muni issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp. said Wednesday it qualified for bond insurance the following 10 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today:
--Greenbrier School District No. 47, Ariz., $1 million construction bonds.
--Elgin, Ill., $4.86 million general obligation corporate purpose bonds.
--Herkimer County, N.Y., $5.5 million GO public improvement bonds.
--Monroe Woodbury Central School District, N.Y., $47.5 million GOs.
--Tennessee Housing Development Agency, $32 million AMT bonds.
--Tennessee Housing Development Agency, $65 million remarketing bonds.
--Harris County Water Control District No. 92, Texas, $1.22 million water and sewer revenue bonds.
